name: Jeffrey Gets Lost
description:
Jeffrey is lost! Only you can help him get home by using the environment to escape each area - but watch out, there are hazards abound in this short but super-cute puzzle platformer.

Keyboard or Controller supported!

Keyboard (2 schemes):
WASD + Space, <, >
Arrows + Space, Z, X

Controller:
Joystick + A, L1, R1

Created in approx 12 hours for Kenney Jam 2021, the theme was "Rotation".
